rules_text:
As Nebula of Empty Gold enters, choose two or three colors. You lose life equal to the number of colors chosen this way.
{T}: Add one mana of any of the chosen colors.
flavor_text:
[i]“It is the nature of humans to exploit, much as it is our nature to try to escape. For them, the Veil is a limitless battery. For us, an oubliette.”
— Sesilius, Chosen Speaker[/i]
notes:
!changed 
!note nbslot
!update nerfed: Changed from two or more colors to two or three colors.
